hananim-i geuleul bulmoui haebyeon-eulo gujehani geuneun byeongdeul-eo iss-eoss deola
hananim-eun jolongbag namuga geu ui wilo jalage hayeossnola
hananim-i sibmanmyeong isang-ui baeg seongdeul-ege geuleul bonaessdeoni
geudeul-i mid-eum-eul gagyeossdeola geulihayeo hananim-eun geudeul-ege jamsidong-an geudeul-ui salm-eul jeulgidolog heolaghayeossnola
geudaeui junim-egeneun ttaldeulman issgo geudeul-egeneun adeulman issneunji mul-eobola
animyeon hananim-i cheonsaleul yeo seong-eulo changjohan geos-eul geudeul-i moggyeog ilado haessneunyo
sillo geudeul-i malhaneun geos-eun kkumyeonaen geos-e bulgwahanila
hananimkkeseo jason-eul nahneunda hani geudeul-eun geojishaneun jadeul-ila
hananimkkeseo adeulboda ttaldeul eul seontaeghaessdan mal-inyo
eotteon iyulo geuleohge pandanha neunyo
neohuineun gyohun-eul badji anihaess deonyo
animyeon neohuiga eotteon bunmyeonghan gwonneung-ilado issdan mal-inyo
neohuiga jinsil-ilamyeon gwonneung-eul ibjunghaneun neohuiui seongseoleul gajyeoola
geudeul-eun hananimgwa yeongma sai ga hyeol-yeongwangyelago kkumyeodaedeola geu leona yeongmadeul-eun jasindeul-i hananim ap-e seoji anihamyeon anidoem-eul jal algo issnola
geudeul-i myosahan geosgwaneun gwangye ga eobs-eusin hananimkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eu soseo
geuleona seongsilhan hananim-ui jong deul-eun geuleohji ani hanila
neohuiwa geuligo neohuiga sungbae haneun usangdeul-eun
eoneu nugudo hananim-e gwanha yeo yuhoghal su eobsnola
geuleona seuseulo taoleuneun bul jiog-eulo ganeun janeun je-oela
jueojin immuga issneun ulineun eoneu nugudo geuleohji anihamyeo
ulineun jul-eul jieo
hananim-eul chanmihaneun jadeul-ila
geuleona geuleohge malhaneun jadeul-eun
seonjodeullobuteo uliege me sejiga iss-eossdamyeon
sillo ulineun seongsilhan hananim-ui jongdeul-i doeeoss-eulila
ie kkulan-i wass-euna geudeul-eungeoyeoghayeoss-euni geudeul-eun god alge doe lila
hananim-ui malsseum-eun geubun-ui jongdeul-eul tonghayeo imi jeonhayeo jyeoss-euni
geudeul-eun sillo seunglihalila
geuligo hananim-ui gundaeneun jeongbog-eul hal geos-ini
jamsi dong-an geudeullobuteo tteol-eojyeo
geudeul-eul jikyeobola geudeuldo jikyeo bolila
geudeul-eun hananim-ui beol-eul seodulleo guham-inyo
geuleona beol-i geudeul-ui neolb-eun tteul-e ileuni gyeong-gobadgo juuihaji anihan saaghan jadeul-ui achim-i bi cheonhadeola
geuleomeulo jamsi dong-an geudeullobuteo tteol-eojyeo
geudeul-eul jikyeobola geudeuldo jikyeobolila
yeong-gwang-gwa gwonneung-eulo chungmanhan geudaeui junim-eul chan-yanghala geubun-eun geu deul-i myosahan geosgwaneun gwangyega eobsno la
seonjijadeul wie pyeong-an-i iss-eulgeos-ila
man-yuui junim-isin hananim-i yeo chanmileul bad-eusoseo
sadeu gyohun-eulo chungmanhan kkulan eun jinlila
geuleona bulsinjadeul-eun geomanhae hago uisim-eulo bulsinhana
hananim-eun geudeul ijeon sedaedeul-eul-eolmana manh-i myeolmangke hayeoss-eumyeo geu ttae geudeul-eun eunhyeleul guhamyeo solichyeoss euna imi sigan-i jinaga beolyeossdeo la
geudeul-ege han gyeong-gojaga ileuleoss-eul ttae bulsinjadeul-eun nollamyeo malhagil ineun geojishaneun masulsala
geuga yeoleo sindeul-eul yuilsin ha nanim-eulo mandeul-eo beolyeossdan mal-inyo sillo igeos-eun nollaun il-ila
geudeul gaunde udumeolideul-i danghwanghayeo tteonamyeo malhagil dol-aga neo huiui sindeul-eul sungbaeham-e innaehala igeos-eun sillo gyehoegdoen eotteon geos-ila
ulineun jigeumkkajiui jong-gyoeseo ileon mal-eul deul-eobon jeog-i eobs-eoss-euni igeos-eun kkumyeonaen uhwa-e bulgwahanola

uli gaundeseo geuege geu mesejileul bonaessdan mal-inyo lago malha myeo geudeul-eun hananim-ui gyesie uisim hago issdeogla ineun geudeul-i geudeul-ui uisim-eulo hananim-ui beol-eul ajig mas boji anihaessgi ttaemun-ila
animyeon geudeul-i wonhaneun daelo gwonneung-gwa suyeohasim-eulo chungmanhasin junim-ui eunhyeui bomulchang-goleul gajigo issdan mal-inyo
animyeon haneulgwa daejiwa geu saiui manmul-eul geudeul-i jugwanhago iss dan mal-inyo geuleohdamyeon eotteohan bangbeob eulodeunji haneul-e oleula hala
geuleona geudeul-i yeonhabhan eotteon gundaedo geogieseo myeolmangha-eossnola
geudeul ijeon-ui seonjijadeul-eul geo yeoghan noaui baegseong-gwa adeuwa oman ham-ui ju-in palaoui baegseong-i geulaess nola
samudeuwa lusgwa supsog-ui donglyodeuldo geuleohan yeonhabgun ieossnola
geudeul jung seonjijadeul-eul geoyeoghaji anihan baegseong-i eobs-eoss-euni hana nim-ui beol-i geudeul-ege ileuge doeeoss nola
ideul-eun danji hanbeon-ui napalsolileul gidaligo issnani geugeos-i i leul ttaeneun yuyedoel su eobsnola
geudeul-eun malhagileul gyesan-ui nal-i ileugi jeon-e seodulleo beol-eul naelyeobolago hadeola
geudeul-i malhaneun geos-e innaehala geuligo hananim-ui jong-imyeo ganghan namseong-in diwis-eul sang-gihala sillo geu neun hananimkke gwiuihan jala
sillo hananim-eun sancheon-eulo hayeogeum geuwa hamkke achimgwa jeonyeog-eulo habjanghayeo hananim-eul chan-yanghala haessnola
geulihayeo moin saedeul modugageuwa hamkke hananimkke sunjong hayeossdeo la
hananim-eun geuui wang-gug-eul gangha ge hasa geuege jihyewa bunmyeonghan pandanlyeog-eul jueossnola
nonjaenghadeon muliui iyagiga geudaeege ileuleossneunyo geudeul-eun gaein-ui gidosil byeog-wilo eullagassdeola

geudeul-i dawis ap-eulo gass-eul ttaegeuga geudeul-eul dulyeowo hani geudeul-i malhagil dulyeowo masiyo jeohuineun ui gyeon-eul dallihaneun dusalam-eulo nuga jalmoshayeossseubnikka jeohuideul-eul jinlilo sseo pandanhayeo jusidoe bujeonghage ma obsigo olh-eun gillo jeohuileul indoha yeo jusoseo

ineun jeoui hyeongjelo aheun a hobmaliui yang-eul soyuhago iss-eumyeo jeoegeneun hanmali bakk-en eobs-seubnida geuleonde geuga geugeos-eul naui bohoa lae dulago malhamyeo jeoege geochin mal-eul haessseubnida

dawis-i malhagil geuga neoege dan hanmali ppun-in neoui yang-eul geuui yangttelo dula yoguhan geos-eun bunmyeonghan jalmos-ila sillo manh-eun dong-eobjadeul-i seolo-ege jalmos hanani igeos-eun mid eum-eul gajgo seon-eul haenghaneun ideulkwa gatji anhnola geuleona geudeul-eun sosula daoes-eun hananimkkeseo geuleul siheomham-eul-algo junimkke buboghayeo yongseoleul gu hago hoegaehayeo hananimkkelo gwiuihayeossdeola
geulihayeo hananim-eun geu-il-e daehayeo geuleul yongseohani geuneun hana nim gakkaie ileuleo aleumdaun an sigcheoleul chaj-assdeogla

dawis-iyeo uliga neoleul jisang ui daelijaloseo dueossgeoneul salamdeul-euljinliwa jeong-uilo pangyeolhala geuligo ne ma-eum-ui yogmang-eul ttaleuji malla geugeosdeul-i neolo hayeogeum hananim-ui gil eseo beos-eonage hamae hananim-ui gil eseo banghwanghaneun jadeul-egeneun gyesanhaneun geunal-eul mang-gaghan iyulo museoun beol-i iss-eulila
hananim-i haneulgwa daejiwa geu saiui manmul-eul changjoham-eun mogjeog-i iss-eossnola geugeos-eun bulsinjadeul-ui geuleusdoen saeng-gag-eulo bulsinhaneun jadeul-egeneunbuljieug-ui beol-i iss-eulila

hananim-i mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-eul jisang-eseo haeag-eul jeo jileun jadeulcheoleom daeuhandan mal-inyo hananim-i saagham-eul meollihaneun jawasaaghan jaleul dong-ilhage dalul su issgessneunyo
yeogie hananim-i geudaeege gyesihan seongseoga issnani chugbog-eulo chungmanhasa geugeos-eulo geudeul-i malsseum-eulsuggohago geugeos-eulo salamdeul-i gyohun-eul bad-a deul-igoja ham-ila
hananim-eun dawis-ege adeullo sollomon-eul jueoss-euni geuneun hullyunghan jong-ieossdeola geulihayeo geuneun hananim-egelo gwiui hayeossdeola
ohuga doeeo geuui ap-eulo maldeul-i natana seo iss-euni anjeongha go dallim-e sinsoghaessdeola
geuga malhagil sillo naneun nauijunim-eul yeom-wonhaneun geos gat-i geugeos-eul salanghaess-euni taeyang-i bam-ui beil sog eulo sum-eul ttaekkajiyeossdeola
geuga naegelo igeos-eul gajyeo ola hadeoni baldeulgwa mogdeul-eul naelyeo chigi sijaghadeola
hananim-eun sollomon-eul siheomhayeoss euni geuui ogjwa-e han sicheleul noh go junim-ui jabileul guhayeossdeola
geuga malhagil juyeo gwan-yong-eul bepul-eo jusoseo geuligo nae da-eum-e neun oji ani hal wang-gug-eul jusoseo sillo dangsin-eun eunhyeleul bepusineun su yeojaisibnida
geuhu hananim-eun balam-eulo ha yeogeum geuege sunjongtologhani geuui myeonglyeong-e ttala geuga wonhaneun gos-eulo yusunhage heulleogadeola
satangwa mogsudeulgwa mul-e deul-eo ganeun jadeuldo geuleohge hadolog haess-eu myeo
soesaseul-e hamkke mug-yeo issneun geudeuldo geuleohge hadolog haessnani
igeos-i hananim-ui eunhyela ne ga geugeos-eulo tain-ege buyeohadeun ttoneun nega geugeos-eul bogwanhadeon gyesan-e daehayeo jilmun-eul badji anihalila
geuleohge hayeo geuneun hananim ga kkai ileumae choehuui ansigcheolo a leumdaun gos-i issdeola
hananim-ui jong yol-eul sang-gihala geuneun junimkke gang-guhagil satan-i go tong-gwa jaenan-eulo jeoleul goelobhinaida
ittae malsseum-i iss-eossnola ne bal lo ttaelila yeogie ssis-eul mulgwa masi gie kkaekkushan mul-i iss-eul geos-ila
hananim-eun geuui gajog-eul beonseongke hasa geuui suleul gobjeollo hayeoss-euni igeos-eun hananim-ui eunhyelo ihaehaneun ideul-eul wihan gyohun-ila

ne son-e handabal-ui pul-eul gaji la geuligo geugeos-eulo ttaelila geuli hadoe maengseleul kkaetteuliji malla sillo hananim-eun geuga innaeham-eulo chungmanham eul al-assnola sillo geuneun hananimkke gwiuihan hullyunghan jong-ila
hananim-ui jong abeulahamgwa i saggwa yagob-eul sang-gihala geudeul-eun gang hago siyaleul gajyeossnola
hananimkkeseo mogjeog-eul dusa geu deul-eul seontaeghayeo naese-ui mesejileul allineunde iss-eossnola
sillo geudeul-eun seontaegbad-eun hullyung han dongbanjadeullo hananim an-e iss-eoss nola
iseuma-elgwa ellisyawa julkipeul-eul sang-gihala geudeuldo seon-indeullo seon taegbad-eun ja jung-e iss-eossnola
igeos-eun hanaui gyohun-ila sil lo uiloun janeun aleumdaun choehuui geojujileul gajil geos-ila
eden-ui cheongug-i balo geudeul-eul wihae mun-eul yeol-eonohgo issnani
geudeul-eun geugos-eseo hyusig-eul chwi hamyeo pungseonghan gwailgwa dalkomhan eumlyo suleul cheonghamae
gat-eun naiui nun-eul naeligam-eun sungyeolhan yeoseongdeul-i geudeul yeop-eseo si jung-eul deunila
geuwa gat-i gyesan-ui nal-eul wihaecheongug-eun neohuiege yagsogdoen geos-ila
hananim-i neohuiege bepun il yonghal yangsig-eun sillo yeong-wonhan geos-ila
saaghan janeun choehuui ansigcheo ga jeojubad-eun gos-i doel geos-ila
geugos-eun jiog-ila geudeul-i geu gos-e ileuni geudeul-i iss-eul gos-eun jeo jubad-eun chimsang-eulo
kkeulhneun aegchewa gud-eoganeun aegche leul masbolila
geuwa yusahan tto daleun beoldeul-iissnola
yeogie neohuiwa hamkke deul-eoon han muliga issnani geudeul-eun hwan-yeongbad ji moshadoda sillo geudeul-eun buljiog eul masbolila

chujongjadeul-i geudeul-ui udumeoli deul-ege malhadoda neohuido machangaji la neohuileul wihan hwandaega eobs-eum-ila uliege i beol-i issge han geosdo neohuideul-ila ije jeojuhal gos-eun jeo jubad-eun gos-ila
juyeo jeohuiege i beol-i issgehan jadeul-egeneun jieug-ui beol-eul deoha yeo jusoseolago geudeul-i malhaja
udumeolideul-eun uliga healigon haessdeon saaghan jadeul-eul bol su eobs neun geos-eun eotteon il-inyo
uliga geudeul-eul jolonghaessgi ttae mun-inyo animyeon uliui nun-i geudeul eul boji musham-inyo
sillo geudeul-i buljiog-eseo seo lo nonjaenghandaneun jinlineun sasil-ila
illeogalodoe sillo naneun gyeong-go ja-e bulgwahamyeo hollo gyesimyeo modeun geos-eul jugwanhasineun hananim oeeneun sin-i eobsnola
hananim-eun haneulgwa daejiwa geu sai manmul-ui junim-isimyeo gwonneung-gwa gwan-yong-eulo chungmanhasin bun-isila
illeogalodoe igeos-eun gajang jung yohan gyesila
geuleonde neohuineun deung-eul dollindan mal-inyo
geudeuldo uigyeon-eul dallihaneun geos-eul naega eotteohge al-assneunyo
igeos-eun naega bunmyeonghan gyeong-goja e bulgwahadaneun gyesila
junimkkeseo cheonsadeul-ege malsseum-iiss-eossnola naega heulg-eulo ingan-eul bich eul geos-ila
naega ingan-ui hyeongsang-eul mandeul-eo geu an-e nae yeonghon-eul bulleo neoh-eulinigeuleul gyeongbaehala
modeun cheonsadeul-i dahamkke geuleoh ge hayeoss-euna
ibeulliseuneun geuleohji anihagogeomanhayeo bulsinja jung-e issge doeeoss deola

hananimkkeseo malsseumhasa ibeulliseuya mueos-i neolo hayeogeum naega naui duson-eulo changjohan geuege bubog ham-eul banghaehaneunyo neoui omanham-ingaanimyeon nega gajang wie issneun ja gaunde issneunyo
ibeulliseuga daedabhagil jega geuboda hullyungham-iyo dangsinkkeseo jeoleulmandeusim-e bul-eseo changjohayeossgo geuleulmandeung-e heulg-eseo bich-eossseubnida
hananim-i malsseumhasa igos-eseo nagala sillo neoneun jeojubad-eun jala
simpan-ui geunalkkaji naui jeoju ga neoege iss-eulila
ibeulliseuga malhagil juyeo jug eunjaga buhwaldoeneun geunalkkaji jeoleul yuyehayeo jusoseo
hananimkkeseo malsseumhasa geuleomyeon nega yuyedoenani
gyeoljeongdoen geu sigan-ui nalkkajila
ibeulliseuga malhagil dangsin-ui gwonneung-e maengsehageonde naega geudeul mo duleul yuhoghalila
geuleona dangsin-ui eunhyelo malmi am-a seongsilhan dangsin-ui jongdeul-eun je-oe la hani
hananimkkeseo malsseumhasa geugeos-eun jinliyo jinliga mueos-inji naega mal halila
neowa geuligo neoleul ttaleuneun mo dulo jiog-eul gadeug chaeulila
illeogalodoe naega igeos-eulo neohuiege eotteohan bosangdo guhaji anihamyeo nae ttohan wiseonjaga anila
igeos-eun modeun inlyuleul wihan gyohun-ila
sillo neohuineun jamsi humyeon geu modeun sasil-eul alge doelila
i seongseoneun gwonneung-gwa jihyelo chungmanhasin hananim-eulobuteo gyesidoen geos-ila
hananimkkeseo jinlilo i seongseoleulgeudaeege gyesihaessnani geubun-eul gyeongbaehago sunjonghadoe gyeong-geonhala

gyeong-geonhan sunjong-eun hananimman-eul wihan geos-ila geuleona hananim anin daleun geosdeul-eul bohojalo baddeuneun jadeul i malhagil ulineun geudeulman seomgigo issnani geudeul-i ulileul hananim ga kkailo delyeoda julila hadeola sil lo hananim-eun nonjaenghaneun geudeul-eul sim panhasilila hananim-eun geojishayeo bulsinhaneun jadeul-eul indohaji ani ha sinila

hananimkkeseo adeul-eul wonhasyeossda myeon geubunkkeseo changjohan ja gaundeseo geubun-i wonhasin jaleul seontaeghasyeoss-eulila geuleona geubunkke yeong-gwang-i iss-euso seo geubun-eun hollo gyesimyeo modeun geos-euljugwanhasineun hananim-isila

hananim-eun haneulgwa daejileul jinlilosseo changjohasa bam-eulo hayeogeum naj eul deopge hago naj-eulo hayeogeum bam-euldeopge hayeoss-eumyeo taeyang-gwa dallo hayeo geum geubun-ui beobchig-e bogjongke hani gagjaneun jeonghayeojin sigan-e unhaenghanilasillo geubun-eun gwonneung-gwa gwan-yong-eulo chung manhasim-ila

hananim-eun han ingan-eulo buteo neohui moduleul changjohasyeossgo geulobuteo baeujaleul changjohasin hu neohuileul wi hayeo yeodeolbmali jaung-ui gachug-eul du syeossnola geubunkkeseo eomeoni taenaeeseo neohuileul mandeusa chalyelo dangyeleul du sieo eodum-eulo galiwojin se gos-i la geuleohge hasineun bun-i balo neohui junim hananim-isini wang-gug-i geubun-ui geos-ila sillo geubun oeeneun sin-i eobs nani geulaedo neohuineun deung-eul dollineunyo

neohuiga hananim-eul bulsinhanda ha deolado hananim-eun neohuileul pil-yolo haji ani hasina geubun-ui jongdeul-i bulsinham-eun joh-ahasiji aniham-ila neohuiga gamsahandamyeon geubun-eun geugeos-eu lo gippeohasidoda jimjinjaga tain-ui jim-eul daesinhal su eobs-eumyeo choehue neo huiga dol-agal gos-eun neohui junim-eulo geuttae geubunkkeseoneun neohuiga haenghaessdeon modeun sasil-eul neohuiege illeo jusi ni geubun-eun ma-eumsog modeun geos-eul algo gyesigi ttaemun-ila

ingan-eun jaeang-i geuege ileun hueya junimkke gidohamyeo hoegaehadeo lado geubun-eun geuege eunhyeleul bepu nila geuleona ingan-eun geuga guwonha yeo gidohaessdeon geosdeul-eul mang-gaghago da si usang-eul sewo salamdeul-eul hananim ui gillobuteo banghwangke ham-ila illeo galodoe bulsinham-eulo neohuiga jamsi jeulgila sillo neohuineun buljiog-ui dong banjadeul-ila

bam-e seuseulo eopdeulyeo yebaehageo na seoseo gidohamyeo naeseleul dulyeowo hago junim-ui eunhyeleul guwonhayeo ye baehaneun jaga geuleohji anihan jawa gat-eul su issneunyo illeogalodoe aneun jawa moleuneun jaga gat-eul su issneunyo sillo ihaehaneun jadeul-eun gyohun-eul bad adeul-inila

illeogalodoe mid-eum-eul gajin na ui jongdeul-iyeo junim-eul dulyeowo hala bosang-eun hyeonseeseo seon-eul silcheonhaneun ideul-egeman issnola geuligo hananim ui daejineun neolbdoda geuleomeulo innae haneun jadeul-eun gyesan-eobsneun bosang-eul bad ge doenila
illeogalodoe hananim-eul seomgidoegyeong-geonhago jinsildoege seong-gila naega myeonglyeong-eul bad-ass-eumyeo
iseullam-e gwiuihaneun cheosbeonjjaegadoela myeonglyeong-eul bad-assnola
illeogalodoe naega junim-eul geo yeoghal ttae sillo eoneu widaehan nal-e museoun beol-eul naega bad-eul geos-ila myeong lyeong-eul bad-ass-eumyeo
illeogalodoe naui gyeong-geonhan heon sin-eulo naega seomgineun bun-eun hananim ila

neohuiga wonhaneun daelo hananim anin daleun geos-eul seomgyeobola illeoga lodoe sillo ilh-eun jalan simpan-ui nal jagiui yeonghongwa geudeul-ui gajogdeul-eul ilh-eun jadeul-ini bola geudeul-i bunmyeong han sonsiljadeul-ila
bul-ui deopgaega geudeul wiwa geudeul-alaee iss-eulila hananimkkeseoneun i geos-eulo jongdeul-eul gyeong-gohasa naui jong deul-iyeo geuleomeulo neohuiga naman-eul dulyeowo hala
saagham-eul hoepihayeo usang-eul sungbaehaji anihago hananimkkelo gwi uihaneun jadeul-eul wihaeseo bog-eum-ui so sigdeul-i issnani geu bog-eum-ui sosigdeul eul naui jongdeul-ege jeonhala
malsseum-eul deulgo geugeos-eul choeseon-eu lo ttaleuneun ja geudeul-i god hananim-ui indoleul bad-eul jadeul-imyeo geudeul-i god ihaehaneun jadeul-ila
beol-ui simpan-eul bad-eul geuga saag ham-eul hoepihan geuwa gat-eul su issneunyo boljiog-e issneun jaleul geudaega guhal su issneunyo

geuleona junim-eul dulyeowo haneun jadeul-eun geudeul-eul wihae jiwojin nop-eun gos-e issge doelini mit-euloneun gangdeul i heuleugo issnola igeos-i hananim ui yagsog-igeoneul hananim-eun geubun-ui yagsog-eul jeobeoliji anh-eusinila

geudaeneun boji moshayeossneunyo ha nanimkkeseo haneullobuteo bileul naeligehasigo geugeos-eulo ttangsog-e umul-eul dusyeoss-eumyeo geuleon hu gajigagsaeg-ui seo lo daleun chomog-eul saengseongke hasigo geuleon hu geugeos-i sideul-eo nolahge doem-egeubunkkeseo geugeos-eul sansanjogag-eulo hasim-eul geudaeneun bolini sillo geu an-eneun ihaehaneun salamdeul-eul wihan gyohun ui gyesiga issnola

hananimkkeseo iseullam-eulo geuuigaseum-eul yeol-eojusa junim-eulobuteo gwangmyeong-eul bad-eun jaga ma-eum-i gud-eun jawagat-eul su issneunyo ma-eum-i gud-eo hananim-eul chanmihaji anihan ja-egeneun jaeang-i issnani sillo geudeul-eun keuge banghwanghago iss-eum-ila

hananimkkeseo gyesileul naelisa gajang aleumdaun malsseum-eulo seongseoleul jusyeossnani ttaeloneun seolo yusahage hayeo ttaeloneun banbog hasyeossdeola ju nim-eul dulyeowo han jadeul-ui pibuneun tteolligo geuleon hu geudeul-ui pibuwa ma-eum-eun hananim-eul chanmiham-eulo pyeon-anhayeo jinani geugeos-i balo hananim-ui bog-eum-ila hananim-eun geubun-i wonhaneunjaleul indohasina banghwangke hagoja wonhaneun ja geuegeneun annaejaga eobs nola

simpan-ui nal-e jigmyeonhal beol-eul dulyeowo han geuwa geuui eolgul-e beol-eul jigmyeonhal geuga gat-eul su issneunyo joe indeul-ege malsseum-i iss-eulini neohuineunneohuiga eod-eun geos-eul masbol geos-ila
geudeul ijeon-ui seonjodeuldo malsseum eul geoyeoghayeoss-euni geudeul-i alji mos haneun gos-eulobuteo beol-i geudeul-ege iss-eossnola
hananim-eun hyeonseeseodo geudeul-ege gul-yog-eul jueoss-euna naeseeseoui beol-eun deoug keunila geudeul-i al-assdeo lamyeon bulsinhaji ani haess-eulila
hananim-eun ingan-eul wihayeo i kkulansog-e modeun jonglyuui biyuleul du eossnani ilo hayeo geudeul-ege gyohun i doegoja ham-ila
geugeos-eun alab-eolo gyesidoen kku lan-imyeo geu an-eneun igyeon-i eobsnani ilo hayeo geudeul-i saagham-eul magneun de issnola

hananim-i biyuhasa seolo ui gyeon-i maj-ji anhneun yeoleo ju-in-eul seomgineun salamgwa han ju-in-egeman chungseongha neun salam-i gat-eul su issneunyo modeun chanmineun hananim-ui geos-ila geuleona geudeul daedasuneun alji moshadeola
eoneunal geudaedo jug-eul geos-imyeo geudeuldo eoneunal jug-eul geos-ila
geulihayeo neohui moduneun simpan ui nal junim ap-eseo nonjaeng-eul hage doelila
